archimate:BusinessActor.name: Government Health Agencies
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
Government Health Agencies
• Purpose: Compliance reporting and data exchange with regulatory bodies (CDC, CMS, state health departments) • Data Exchange: Quality measures, adverse events, public health reporting, regulatory compliance data • Integration Methods: HL7 FHIR, direct secure messaging, file uploads to government portals • Critical Functions: Meaningful use reporting, quality measure submission, outbreak notification, immunization registries
